Title: NetSnoop
Description: Netsnoop allows everyone to get a quick overview over alle the current connections on their workstation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Netsnoop allows everyone to get a quick overview over alle the current connections on their workstation.

Planned Features
  • Advanced sorting and filtering.
  • Logging and analysis of the logged data.
  • Statistical data from the network adapter.

Implemented Features
  • No big features implemented yet.

Changelog
  • 0.2 - Change in code and project design. Connection listing is now based on the iphlpapi.dll
  • 0.1 - Initial release with basic gui and very basic networking functions
